name: Youth 1st Program
description: Youth 1st is a comprehensive year-round academic enrichment program, serving at-risk youth and all youth ages 5-15 years old. We operate Monday through Friday and support youth in Math, Science, English, Language Arts, Reading, Arts & Crafts, Sports, and Recreation. Youth 1st focuses on skill development and effort. Throughout the year, Youth 1st offers educational field trips for its participants. We also host cultural celebrations for an all-inclusive experience. During the summer months, Yout
